snippet.title: Crumbling Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Crumbling is coming to Quest and SteamVR Q1 2024 and a bit later to Pico!

Who says you’re too old to play with toys? Crumbling is a VR roguelike where you control your character with one hand, just like playing with an action figure! Battle against an onslaught of plastic monsters in thrilling hack’n’slash combat, in a romping adventure that’ll take you right back to your childhood.

Follow us!
Discord:  https://discord.gg/k3PPEQ54W6
Insta: https://www.instagram.com/crumblinggame/
X:  https://x.com/CrumblingVR
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@crumblingvr

Try it now!
Demo on AppLab: https://ocul.us/3IG17BO
Demo on Steam: https://s.team/a/1701870
